Author: lauryleah
Text: same here. most of the time I'm really close to being normal again but I won't let that happen. I'm too scared to become that overweight girl I've always been again. Author: Rivka90
Text: I feel you. I feel like the only safe weight for me in 90 because I can still eat and fluctuate 5-8 pounds and not lose my bmi. I hate being short. I wish I was a gazelle with a TDEE of 5348756345876349.
